name: KnowledgeMill Link File
summary: Learn about .KMR files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
Microsoft Outlook with KnowledgeMill Filer plug-in

content: KMR files can be shared with other KnowledgeMill users in order to access the linked resource on the KnowledgeMill server.

description: File used by KnowledgeMill Filer, a Microsoft Outlook plug-in used for filing email content based on categories and business criticalness; saves a link to an artifact (e.g., a document) filed into a KnowledgeMill server.
